Package game

Class RulesHuman

java.lang.Object
game.RulesHuman
public class RulesHuman
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents all game rules. First, card on top of deck in the middle of the table is compared to cards on hand. Next, if player can play a card, he does it. This card is now the card on top of table and withdrawn from deck of cards. If no card can be played: draw a card from deck. We have an exception for action cards (handle draw two, reverse) and wild cards (draw four).
